metadata.title: Kanjibox
metadata.description: Une appli simple d'apprentissage du Japonais

welcome.description: Home page of Kanji Box, below are the recently recorded kanji. To view/edit kanji or words, click on the buttons below.

addKanji.description: To add a kanji, please provide its value. You can optionally let the app handle the detection of various readings and translations (in English).
addKanji.preview: The following information has been automatically generated for this kanji. You can either accept it as is or go back to input it manually

validations.readingRequired: Please enter at least one KUN or ON reading

description.auto: To add a word, please provide its value.
description.manual: To add a word, please provide its value, its furigana transcription, and its translation.

addWord.preview: The following information has been automatically generated for this word. You can either accept it as is or go back to input it manually
